title: Can we roll back to the old Taric?
body:
The updated Taric is not played any more than the old Taric was, but one difference is the old Taric was a solid champion.

Old Taric's Q scaled well when you stacked health.
Old Taric's W shredded armor of the enemy providing extra damage from your ADC.
Old Taric's E did not require you to be a snooker champion to land a stun coming from your linked team mate.
Old Taric's ult boosted your entire team's damage output rather than letting the enemy team know who to kill quickly before the ult makes them invincible. His new ult is also not unique enough to pick him. Pick a Kindred JG and Taric stays in his 2% pick rate box.

You can keep the new model, just give Taric his gems back.

Be outrageous and do it Rito, I don't think anyone will notice.

Also I think there should be some greater player base input on how this game is shaped in future. Let's not forget the moral of the Nostalrius saga.
{{champion:44}}

replies.body: i disagree, E led to bigger more complicated plays, W allows an ally to become butt buddies with you and has a sheild, you Q can apply to the whole team and works well if you get healing items, his ult is awesome
Yeah I like the new Taric gameplay, but his numbers are pretty low, especially the Q heal, it's terrible!

Yeah it was nerfed hard. It should go back to a one person heal that can make a difference in a fight for the person getting hammered.

I know Riot are trying to remove point-and-click cc abilities to separate player skill from raw champion function, but when you've still got Rammus' taunt and Pantheon's leap after all this time it's a bit rich.
